title: Remove Matching Elements From Array
description: In this lab, we will be exploring how to remove matching elements from an array using JavaScript. We will be using the Array.prototype.filter() method to find the elements that match the given condition and Array.prototype.reduce() method to remove them from the original array. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript.

meta.title: Removing Matching Elements | JavaScript Array Manipulation
meta.description: Learn how to remove specific elements from an array using JavaScript's Array.prototype.filter() and Array.prototype.reduce() methods. Improve your array manipulation skills.
